place.name: CRAILING
place.gazetteerText: Crailing, par. and vil., Roxburghshire, on Oxnam Water, 3½m. NE. of Jedburgh, 5966 ac., pop. 638; P.O. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
